newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Suharto to fulfill official duty on Friday.
newsitem.headline: Suharto to fulfill official duty on Friday.

text.p: Palace sources said on Friday that Indonesia's President Suharto would fulfill his official duties after a normal day's activities the day before.
"He will meet the secretary-general of China's State Council and meet participants of the armed forces high-ranking officials meeting at the Merdeka Palace," one source told Reuters.
Palace sources said late on Thursday that Suharto was at home and in good health after a normal day's activities, despite renewed rumours on foreign exchange markets that he was ill.
"These rumours are crazy. The president is at home and in good health," one source said.
